title: Pricing Page V1
description: Original pricing page wireframes (V1) with three layout variants for product presentation. Superseded by Pricing Page V2.

professional-cards.name: Professional Cards
professional-cards.label: Wireframe A
professional-cards.description: Classic card-based layout with structured product presentation to help buyers compare offerings systematically.
professional-cards.hypothesis: Classic card-based layout with structured product presentation helps buyers compare offerings systematically

unified-panel.name: Unified Panel
unified-panel.label: Wireframe B
unified-panel.description: Single cohesive panel emphasizing platform unity so buyers experience the offer as a streamlined product.
unified-panel.hypothesis: Single cohesive panel emphasizing platform unity reduces cognitive load and highlights product synergies

cards-foundation.description: Professional cards anchored by the Data Uploader foundation showcase to highlight extensibility.
cards-foundation.hypothesis: Professional cards with foundational Data Uploader showcase demonstrates platform extensibility
